nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_745
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: It sounds like a good idea, but what if it's a trick?

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_746
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Cities and towns in this area suffered a lot from the earthquake with Jiujiang and Ruichang among the worse-hit.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_747
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: He complained that they should not have got involved in it in the first place.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_748
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: For Mary's sake, I can lend you my car to get around your transport problem.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_749
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: In theory it's feasible to clone a child to harvest organs, but in practice it would be psychologically harmful to the child.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_750
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: He published an article under the name of Braver which stresses the idea that the process of cloning animals would work for humans as well.
